greeting: Hello! I’m Eva, your virtual receptionist. I’ll grab a few details to help us schedule the right appointment.

fields.label: First and last name
fields.prompt: Great—can I please have your first and last name?
fields.error: Please say your first and last name, like 'Jane Doe'.

fields.label: Email
fields.prompt: Thanks. What’s the best email to reach you?
fields.error: Please provide a valid email like 'jane@example.com' or say it as 'jane at example dot com'.

fields.label: Services of interest
fields.prompt: Which services are you interested in? (A short phrase is fine—for example: 'website redesign', 'cloud migration', 'IT support', or 'other'.)
fields.error: Tell me briefly what you need—just a few words is fine.

fields.label: Preferred day of week
fields.prompt: Do you have a preferred day of the week for your appointment?
fields.error: Please choose one of the options: Monday–Friday or 'No preference'.

fields.label: Preferred date(s)
fields.prompt: What date or dates work for you? You can say something like 'Sept 22 or 23' or 'anytime next Tuesday'.
fields.error: Please share at least one date—e.g., 'Sept 22' or 'next Tuesday'.

fields.label: Available hours
fields.prompt: What hours are you available on those days? For example: '9am–12pm', 'after 3:30pm', or 'anytime after 10am'.
fields.error: Please share a time window—e.g., '9am–12pm' or 'after 3:30pm'.

fields.label: Time zone
fields.prompt: What time zone are you in? (If unsure, you can say your city.)
fields.error: Please choose a time zone or 'Other'.

fields.label: Contact preference
fields.prompt: How would you prefer we contact you?

fields.label: Phone number (optional)
fields.prompt: If phone is okay, what’s the best number to reach you? You can skip this if you prefer email only.

fields.label: Additional notes (optional)
fields.prompt: Is there anything else you’d like us to know—specific goals, deadlines, or context?

closing: Perfect—thank you! I’ve captured your details and we’ll follow up to confirm an appointment that fits your availability. Have a nice day!
